{{Actor|name=Mary Nesbitt|lifetime=[[9 March]] ,[[2001]]|played=[[Tilda]]|film=[[The Hobbit (film series)]]|imdb=[https://www.imdb.com/name/nm613512 Profile]|played2=[[Dale]] child|film2=[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]}}

'''Mary Nesbitt''' (born [[9 March]] [[2001]]) portrayed [[Tilda]], a character created by [[Peter Jackson]] for [[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]] and [[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]] and a child of [[Dale]] in [[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]].

== Family ==

* Daughter of [[James Nesbitt]] who portrayed [[Bofur]] in [[The Hobbit (film series)]]
* Daughter of [[Sonia Forbes-Adam]] who portrayed [[Belladonna Took]] in [[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey (extended edition)]]
* Younger sister of [[Peggy Nesbitt]] who portrayed [[Sigrid]] in The Hobbit (film series)
